us.phonetic: /ˌɪnˈsaɪd, ˈɪnˌsaɪd/, (prep. in′sīd′, in′sīd′; adv. in′sīd′; n. in′sīd′; adj. in′sīd′, in′-, in′sīd′)

example.eg: I stay inside when it is cold outside.
example.egtrans: 外面寒冷时，我呆在室内。

trans_examp.trans_cn: 在户内, 在室内, 在屋内

example.eg: He stayed inside the room for three hours.
example.egtrans: 他在房间里呆了三个小时。

example.eg: The inside of the house is beautiful.
The child was drawing inside the square.
You need to keep your feet on the inside of the line.
example.egtrans: 你的脚必需站在这条线的内侧。

trans_examp.trans_cn: 内侧, 内圈, 里道

example.eg: Deep inside himself he felt a need to preach the Gospel.
example.egtrans: 在内心深处，他想要传布福音。

trans_examp.trans_cn: 在…心里面, 在…身体里面

example.eg: The pigeon was dead and you could see its insides.
example.egtrans: 那只鸽子已经死了，你可以看到它的内脏。

us.phonetic: /ˌɪnˈsaɪd, ˈɪnˌsaɪd/, (prep. in′sīd′, in′sīd′; adv. in′sīd′; n. in′sīd′; adj. in′sīd′, in′-, in′sīd′)

example.eg: The inside car is in the lead.

trans_examp.trans_cn: 在里面的, 在内侧的, 在内道的

example.eg: The inside rumour was that he was going to be sacked.
My uncle spent ten long years inside.
With that government, nobody knows what happened on the inside.
example.egtrans: 那个政府没人知道内幕如何。

example.eg: I can finish this inside thirty minutes.

us.phonetic: /ˌɪnˈsaɪd, ˈɪnˌsaɪd/, (prep. in′sīd′, in′sīd′; adv. in′sīd′; n. in′sīd′; adj. in′sīd′, in′-, in′sīd′)

trans_examp.trans_cn: 内部玩笑，行内幽默，圈子里的玩笑

dsense.name: inside address
dsense.guideword: (correspondence: address of recipient written on letter)

example.eg: In a business letter, the inside address is on the left above the "Dear Sirs" salutation.
As the understudy to the lead, she had to know the part inside and out.

dsense.name: inside front cover
dsense.guideword: (reverse side of book or magazine cover)

example.eg: The price of the book is marked on the inside front cover.
The company should limit the number of employees with access to inside information.

trans_examp.trans_cn: 内部信息, 内部资料, 内部情报

example.eg: Apparently, the jewelry store robbery was an inside job.

dsense.name: inside joke, in-joke
dsense.guideword: (private joke understood only by a few)

example.eg: Something was rattling inside of the box.
My order arrived by post inside of a week.
That jumper's on inside out.
example.egtrans: 那套毛衣穿反了。//我把皮手套戴反了，皮毛在外面了。

example.eg: He put his shirt on so quickly he didn't notice it was inside out.
example.egtrans: 他穿衬衫太快了，他没有注意到穿反了。

example.eg: The dolls nested inside each other.
When you do not need to use the tables, you can nest them inside one another.
The programmer nested the subroutine inside the main routine.
example.egtrans: 那个程序员将子例程嵌套在主例程中。
